channel.title: Posts on Albru's trash can
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Albru's trash can

item.title: The beginning
item.description: You’ve come to a place full of terrible code and mechanical keyboards obsession and I’m going to give you more of these for sure. My plan is using this blog to log progress of my coding experiments, custom mechanical keyboard projects and who knows, maybe even more in the future. In the nearest future I’m going to publish progress of creating my home-made 75% keyboard. Who am I? My name’s Albert Moravec and I’m a programmer from the Czech republic with a lot of interests… I’ll eventually reveal them to you, but all you need to know for now is that I’m into programming, electronics and DIY.
